metaContent: Support. Here are all the answers to the questions and instructions to make it easier for you to set up your VPN

header.subText: Here are all the answers to the questions and instructions to make it easier for you to set up your VPN

howToCard.text: Where to get a server if you don't have one and how to connect it to the application

instructionsCard.text: Setting up the application, working with SSH keys, protocol selection, VPN split tunneling and much more

contactsCardLabel: Contact the chat for help if something does not work
